metadata.title: CVE-2021-25312 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: HTCondor before 8.9.11 allows a user to submit a job as another user on thesystem, because of a flaw in the IDTOKENS authentication method.

criterions.comment: condor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
